channel.title: help-wanted on Apache Comdev
channel.description: Recent content in help-wanted on Apache Comdev

item.title: Preparing the Community Development blog move
item.description: We’re in the process of moving our content here from the existing blogs.apache.org location. Help wanted ¶ The content has been exported to a branch of the comdev-site repository, it needs a bit of tweaking, patches welcome!

item.title: Apache Related Event Calendars
item.description: Help wanted ¶ This page can probably just redirect to the events.apache.org website, would anything be missing if we do that? Calendar ¶ This calendar lists major events relating to The Apache Software Foundation and our many Apache projects. We also have an automated listing of upcoming Apache-related Meetups (smaller events) available. This Calendar is maintained by Apache Community Development volunteers (ComDev); to have your event listed considered for addition please mail dev@community.
